name: Ice path
description:
A short puzzlescript game about making trails of walkable floor to create solvable levels that use ice blocks as mechanics.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=6df83154fb88dfa09d40775ffbf065a1

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=6df83154fb88dfa09d40775ffbf065a1

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
